```py
from kafka import KafkaProducer

producer = KafkaProducer(bootstrap_servers=['localhost:9092'],
                         value_serializer=json_serializer)
```

if you have more than 1 partition this we send data randomly to each of this partition.

but you can also set the producer to send to a specific topic partition

```py

def partition(key_byte, all_partion, available):
 return 0

producer = KafkaProducer(bootstrap_servers=['localhost:9092'],
                         value_serializer=json_serializer, partitioner=partition)

```
